docs.snippet: Businessman David Perdue has defeated longtime Rep. Jack Kingston in the Republican runoff for Georgia's U.S. Senate nomination, setting up a matchup against Democratic nominee Michelle Nunn that will help determine which party controls the Senate...
docs.lead_paragraph: Businessman David Perdue has defeated longtime Rep. Jack Kingston in the Republican runoff for Georgia's U.S. Senate nomination, setting up a matchup against Democratic nominee Michelle Nunn that will help determine which party controls the Senate for the final years of the Obama administration.

headline.main: Perdue Defeats Kingston in Georgia Senate Runoff
headline.print_headline: Perdue Defeats Kingston in Georgia Senate Runoff
